name: com.vestigial.ecstoumod
description:
What does this package do? 
▪ Allows generated ECS code (ex: Entities.ForEach, and [GenerateAuthoringComponent]) to be included in UMod mod files
▪ Registers ECS types (IComponentData, etc) found in loaded mods, with the TypeManager, in Editor mode
▪ Provides instructions to get WriteGroupAttribute functionality working in the editor
▪ Scans loaded ModHosts for instances of SystemBase and injects them into the World and update loop
▪ Forces you to load mods early enough for the TypeManager to work correctly, in play mode
